alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 01 at 11:02PM CST until March 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...ELEVATED TO CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE FOR ALL OF DEEP SOUTH TEXAS AND THE RIO GRANDE VALLEY LATE THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... .A strong cold front will bring lower humidity and gusty northwesterly winds Thursday night into early Friday morning. When combined with cured fuels and moderate to severe drought conditions, this could lead to the rapid and erratic spread of wildfires Thursday night. Conditions improve Friday morning as winds diminish. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING FOR FOR STRONG WINDS, CURED FUELS, AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES COASTAL KENEDY, COASTAL WILLACY, COASTAL CAMERON COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Coastal Kenedy, Coastal Willacy, Coastal Cameron, Kenedy Island, Willacy Island and Cameron Island. * TIMING... 3 AM FRIDAY TO NOON FRIDAY. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s. * LIGHTNING...Very low chance. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
